originalText.text: Place looks clean. Great service by Dr. Heller. I couldn't complain. He always does great work. Being an old assistant I can confirm this comment. Jennie is a loyal worker, always maintains the place running on track and super professional. you can trust this place

text.text: Place looks clean. Great service by Dr. Heller. I couldn't complain. He always does great work. Being an old assistant I can confirm this comment. Jennie is a loyal worker, always maintains the place running on track and super professional. you can trust this place

originalText.text: Very clean, nice atmosphere, Dr Heller and employees very friendly. Best, Dr Heller very honest in discussing how to go forward as new patient.

text.text: Very clean, nice atmosphere, Dr Heller and employees very friendly. Best, Dr Heller very honest in discussing how to go forward as new patient.

originalText.text:
I've been going to Dr. Heller for years and it has always been an enjoyable experience.

Went back today for my first long overdue cleaning due to covid and happy to see that not much has changed with how he and his wonderful treats their patients. Everyone there is incredibly friendly and the staff have a playful and positive relationship with one another. Facilities are clean and up to date. It's pretty obvious to me Dr. Heller truly cares about his patients and will not recommend unnecessary work - he's not in it for the insurance payout but instead cares about each patient's best interest and comfort. Staff is very knowledgeable and will clearly explain to you any changes or improvements you should make without talking down to you. Highly recommend!

text.text:

originalText.text: Went for a cleaning and had my uvula suctioned twice by the tube that suctions out saliva. Ended up with a necrotic uvula (read dead tissue) for a couple of weeks. Neither the dental hygienist or dentist felt the need to name what had happened or what I could expect in terms of recovery. Very painful the first day and a swollen, elongated and uncomfortable uvula for the next couple of weeks is expected as it slowly heals and the dead part sloughs off. In the meantime I feel like I'm gagging on my own uvula.

originalText.text:
Dr. Heller is the best. I use to have anxieties about going to the dentist. But the last 3 yrs I've had the best dental hygiene I've ever had. Mostly because of his bedside manner the other part is the music he plays throughout the office.
Thanks Dr. Heller❤️
